author: NASS
description:
I used a new colorization technique, restored and applied face restoration, and created a sound design for this video of British Empire 1940s, takes us on a journey across London at the heart of the Empire, then to Australia, New Zealand, Canada, South Africa, and India, showcasing the ties that connected these nations in the postwar years. The restoration brings vivid life to these historic images, ending with a return to London as the symbol of unity and reconstruction.

00:10-00:51 LONDON
00:52-01:45 AUSTRALIA
01:46-02:29 NEW ZEALAND
02:30-03:38 CANADA
03:39-04:22 SOUTH AFRICA
04:23-05:36 INDIA
05:37-08:47 LONDON



Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorizatio
title: British Empire 1940s in color  [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
